title: The Perfect Home - Home in Puyallup. 4 Beds, 2 Baths
posting_body: 4 bedroom rambler on peaceful lot with in-ground pool awaits!
Don’t miss the opportunity to live close to everything while feeling miles away!
Situated on nearly 3/4 acre w/lofty trees, you’ll experience the tranquility the minute you arrive.
This home is solidly built, boasts a great layout & is ready for your updates!
Spacious kitchen, dining, living rooms, & family room w/fireplace.
The primary bedroom features ¾ ensuite bath, down the hall you'll find 2 add'l bedrooms & full bath.
Another bedroom & ½ bath are on the other side of the living room.
You'll love having your own in-ground pool w/concrete patio surround & large entertaining deck!
Close to parks, freeways and amenities!
